title: Merck KGaA 's revenue by segment 2014 to 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Health Segments on X-axis for 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Revenue in million euros.

Health Segment Healthcare had the maximum Revenue in million euros among all 5 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum Revenue in million euros was observed in Health Segment Performance Materials for 2014.
Among all the Health Segments, 2016 had the highest Revenue in million euros in Health Segment Healthcare and lowest Revenue in million euros in Health Segment Performance Materials.

The maximum Revenue in million euros for 2016 that was found in Health Segment Healthcare was 2.73 times larger than the minimum Revenue in million euros observed in Health Segment Performance Materials.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Health Segments on X-axis for 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Revenue in million euros.
In Health Segment Healthcare, 2017 had the highest Revenue in million euros 6999.0 among the 5 groups and in Performance Materials, 2014 had the lowest Revenue in million euros 2060.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Health Segments on X-axis for 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Revenue in million euros.

Health Segment Healthcare had the maximum Revenue in million euros among all 5 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum Revenue in million euros was observed in Health Segment Performance Materials for 2014.
Among all the Health Segments, 2016 had the highest Revenue in million euros in Health Segment Healthcare and lowest Revenue in million euros in Health Segment Performance Materials.

The maximum Revenue in million euros for 2016 that was found in Health Segment Healthcare was 2.73 times larger than the minimum Revenue in million euros observed in Health Segment Performance Materials.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Revenue in million euros on the Y-axis for 3 different Health Segments for 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.

Health Segment Healthcare had the maximum Revenue in million euros among all 5 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum Revenue in million euros was observed in Health Segment Performance Materials for 2014.
Among all the Health Segments, 2016 had the highest Revenue in million euros 6855.0 in Health Segment Healthcare and lowest value 2511.0 in Health Segment Performance Materials.

The maximum Revenue in million euros for 2016 that was found in Health Segment Healthcare was 2.73 times larger than the minimum Revenue in million euros observed in Health Segment Performance Materials.
Among the groups, 2014 had the biggest difference in Revenue in million euros. Where the maximum Revenue in million euros was 3.21 times larger than the minimum Revenue in million euros.

2017 had the maximum Revenue in million euros out of all 5 groups in Health Segment Healthcare followed by 2017 in Healthcare, and the minimum Revenue in million euros is found for 2014 in Performance Materials.
Averaging all 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018, the Health Segment Healthcare is the maximum Revenue in million euros and Performance Materials is the minimum Revenue in million euros.
